examples: Bob showed great discretion despite his knowledge of the affair.

definitions.definition: The ability to make wise choices or decisions .
The freedom to make one's own judgements .
examples: I leave that to your discretion .

subdefinitions.definition: The authority to exercise one's own judgement in making decisions that have effect.
examples: The police came and searched us at their discretion because we were shouting at each other's faces.

secondary_definitions: The ability to make wise choices or decisions .
The freedom to make one's own judgements .
